title: Canon EOS Rebel DSLR T6 Camera Body + Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens & EF 75-300mm III Lens + Canon EOS Shoulder Bag (Black) + SanDisk SDXC 64GB Memory Card + Cleaning Cloth + Ultimate Canon Bundle
features:
Make sure this fits
                by entering your model number.
This Photo4Less Top Value Camera And Lenses With USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied Accessories Kit includes:
Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera Body - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens - Sandisk Ultra SDXC 64GB 80MB/S C10 Flash Memory Card - Photo4Less Cleaning Cloth

Canon EOS Shoulder Bag 100ES (Black) - Holds a DSLR & 1-2 Lenses & Accessories - Padded, Interior Divider - Large Weather Flap with Buckle - Top Grab Handle - Shoulder Strap with Sliding Pad - Light Gray Interior for Locating Gear - Made of Water-Repellent Nylon.

18MP APS-C CMOS Sensor - DIGIC 4+ Image Processor - 3.0" 920k-Dot LCD Monitor - Full HD 1080p Video Recording at 30 fps - 9-Point AF with Center Cross-Type Point - Extended ISO 12800, 3 fps Shooting - Built-In Wi-Fi with NFC - Scene Intelligent Auto Mode - Basic+ and Creative Auto Modes.

In the Box Manufacturer Accessories: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens - LP-E10 Lithium-Ion Battery Pack - LC-E10 Battery Charger for EOS Rebel T3, T5, T6 - Eyecup Ef for Digital Rebel Cameras - RF-3 Body Cap for Canon EOS Cameras - EW-400D Neck Strap - Battery Cover IFC-130U - Interface Cable - Limited 1-Year Warranty.

reviews.reviewText: I bought this set as a gift, so I don’t know exactly how good the picture quality and function is. But everything in the set was there as promised, nothing damaged, and quick shipping. This was the best set on amazon for this camera in my opinion because the other ones come with a bunch of incompatible, cheap junk. This one gives you all the essentials, and good quality ones you can actually use! I’m satisfied with my purchase!

I really love this camera because I have a small tremor in my hands, and the camera automatically corrects for that and the pictures come out amazingly sharp with beautiful color. I have never taken pictures so nice than with this camera. I had given up taking photographs because they always turned out blurry, but now, I'm back at it.

The package deal that we got with the camera was terrific, and the price was outstanding. It was a deal that we simply could not pass up. I would highly recommend this camera to everyone - beginners and pros alike. The seller was phenomenal. The camera shipped and was received within two days of payment in perfect condition. The packaging was not damaged in any way and the items were packaged such that there would be no damage should the outer package have been damaged. I would also purchase from this seller again.
I shopped around for a nice camera and finally came across this. Amazing quality and you get so many things for such a decent price. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: A perfect gift for our granddaughter to use for her overseas studies
reviews.reviewText: Canon gives you so much value for the product. Very dependable, durable and reliable. I'm sure she'll send us some amazing photos during her time abroad.
With the help of YouTube we figured out the best settings for our camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for newbies and veterans alike
reviews.reviewText: Needed a camera for photography class, love the freedom the features offer but it would be very confusing if you don’t read the manual or have someone to show you what everything does. My professor still uses her old t3 happily though but I heard they were being discontinued so I went with this t6 instead
Everything was fantastic!

PERFECTA!
Todos los artículos son los descritos por el vendedor.
RÁPIDO!
Great camera for beginners and intermediates. WiFi setup and control could be much better. The lenses are not top of the line but work well enough for everyday use.

For a first timer, I couldn’t have asked for more. This makes me feel so professional, and all of our family photos now look like we hired someone to take them!!! Not to mention how much this has improved my Instagram! The auto focus stuff sometimes confuses me and the camera won’t take pics if it’s isnt focused on something but once you figure it out it’s seriously awesome.
Great camera great price

my daughter is a make-up artist. she takes pictures of the models faces when she finishes applying the make-up and their photos are uploaded on her web page from the camera. the photos look professional.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great gift for a special occasion.
reviews.reviewText: Well, i tried canceling the order about 10 seconds after i placed it because i found a T7 with lots of accessories for less that buying a kit and this separately, but wouldn't let me. said it already shipped. Was kinda confused about that. However, my wife loves this and it does better shots that she can hope for. Perfect gift.
Happy with the camera so far. Picture quality seems to be great! Enjoying the camera and it's functionality.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it.

I purchased this Canon package for my wife for Christmas. She loves it. Shipping was fast and it was as advertised. No off brand extra lens, it’s all Canon quality. She has only used it for the holidays but we are impressed with the quality. Thank you Photo4less.
A great camera with features of a more expensive model.... all at an attractive price.
Canon makes a great product.
